requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel I3 3210 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Grafics/NVIDIA GT710/AMD Radeon HD 7570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Changes may occuring during development
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel I5 4600 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950/AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Changes may occuring during development
